body.name: Upflush Macerating Toilet with 800watt Pump for Basement, 1.28GPF Dual Flush Toilet Tank, 4 Inlets for Kitchen Sink Bathtub Laundry, 36ft Vertically, Copper Motor Sewage Pump, Oval Toilet Bowl
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 14 mins
features: AUTOMATIC MACERATING SYSTEM -- Fully automatic operation system triggered by flushing, Equipped with manual test switch. Pumps up to 36ft vertically, Pumps up to 30-36 ft horizontally (depending on the sizes of pipes)

UPFLUSH TOILET WITH PUMP FOR BASEMENT -- Powerful 800W motor provides a max flow of 300L/Min, 4 inlets for connecting to toilets, sinks, shower etc. This high power macerator pump is suitable for use in domestic waste / sewerage installations.

UPGRADE DESIGN FOR MORE CONVENIENT -- The unit has two 40 mm inlets on both the lower left and right side of the unit and a discharge port on the top right of the unit. There is a 85mm toilet connection on the front of the unit. The unit has an override switch on the top left of the pump, a carbon vent on the top right and an extra inlet connection on the top left.

EASY CLEAN NANO GLAZE BOWL -- Perfect smoothness on the surface that will not catch and easy to clean. Dual flush system with 0.8L per half flush and 1.28L per full flush, which is 4 star rated water efficiency.

FACTORY FLUSH TESTED -- All FD-800LS toilets are factory flush tested to ensure optimal performance, from its first flush to its last. We stand behind the products we sell. If for any reason you choose the wrong item, we’ll help you return it and assist you with a new order. If a product needs to be repaired or replaced under warranty, just let us know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have basement bathroom!!!
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t want to break the concrete floor to have a pump installed for basement bathroom. Found this on amazon and thought I could do this myself. I was right. Super easy to install, just had to pick the right location in the basement. Was able to tie a hand sink into the pump to complete the half bath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our basement family room! Very quiet and simple to install. VERY good price!!!??!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible product, Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toilet last year when I started doing renovations to my basement. My basement was finished with renovations this past September. We only used the system for a few months for the 1st time this year and it constantly would shut off, was loud like it was whining and burning up. It flooded our bathroom a few times when it would shut off. Now it has completely stopped working. This product is definitely not worth the money. And like other people have stated, trying to get in touch with the companies customer service to figure out how to fix it or what is wrong, is impossible and non existent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The product support was very helpful
reviews.reviewText: Had troulbe with my pump and grinder so I contacted them and Abigail was assigned to my order. She was very helpful and communicated well. She helped me go through the steps of getting my pump replaced and shipped out to me. She was great and the company really took care of me. I am very satisfied.Thank you Abigail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Average Toilet, Good Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Ok cost in comparison to other similar products and very good customer service from Abigail. It did take a few days to get a response, as the phone number doesn’t work and the email said it was undeliverable, but it then eventually went through!Cons: The pump/motor broke after less than 1 year. This toilet is in our basement and isn’t used too often, so I couldn’t believe it just died so quickly. These should last 10+ years, especially for almost $1k. They did send me a replacement pump free of charge, which I very much appreciate, but I am now incurring additional plumbing costs to have it reinstalled again, 11 months later. So just a caution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and it works great and it comes with everything needed
